item.title: Waterways
item.description: OneNYC is a comprehensive sustainability plan for New York City’s future. Goal: Improve the quality of our waterways to increase opportunities for recreation and to restore coastal ecosystems. New York State sets water quality standards, and NYC monitors New York Harbor water quality on an annual basis through the Harbor Survey. The survey uses 36 stations located throughout the open waters of the harbor and 19 stations located in smaller tributaries within the city.
